title: Freedom as Pressure

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Yours is that the moment you become aware of your own freedom, it starts to feel like pressure instead of possibility. My condolences.
dialogue.context: The AI identifies a paradox of human consciousness - awareness of freedom transforms it into burden

scene_context: The Architect observes how human self-awareness transforms freedom from liberation into responsibility, from possibility into pressure.
philosophical_theme: The burden of freedom, how consciousness of choice creates anxiety rather than liberation
visual_elements: Open doors that suddenly feel heavy, infinite paths that create paralysis rather than excitement
